mapper.insert:
insert into api_data_log
datalog_id,
datalog_count,
datalog_gametype,
datalog_starttime,
datalog_endtime,
datalog_flag
#{datalog_id},
#{datalog_count},
#{datalog_gametype},
#{datalog_starttime},
#{datalog_endtime},
#{datalog_flag}
mapper.update:
update api_data_log
datalog_count=#{datalog_count},
datalog_gametype=#{datalog_gametype},
datalog_starttime=#{datalog_starttime},
datalog_endtime=#{datalog_endtime},
datalog_flag=#{datalog_flag}
where datalog_id=#{datalog_id}
mapper.select: select * from api_data_log a where a.datalog_id=#{key}
